original_title: Le Jardin des délices de Jérôme Bosch
overview: Filmed by Jean Eustache for the television program, Les Enthousiastes, Hieronymous Bosch's Garden of Delights presents a series of unstructured observations, free associations, and interpretations on the third panel of Bosch's well-known oil on wood triptych.
title: Hieronymous Bosch's Garden of Delights
